Name: Special rigger licensing requirements.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to special rigger licensing requirements.
Summary: Int. No. 476 would increase the amount of experience required to obtain a special rigger license.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. Item 1 of section 28-404.3.2 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as amended by local law number 141 for the year 2013, is amended to read as follows:
1.	Has at least [one year] three years of practical experience in the hoisting and rigging business within the [three] five years prior to application;

	ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect on October 1, 2014, except that this local law shall not apply to work related to applications for construction document approval filed prior to such effective date, and except that the commissioner of buildings shall take such measures as are necessary for its implementation, including the promulgation of rules, prior to such effective date.

EAA
